title: Student-Generated Content Development Course for Laboratory Safety and Procedure Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals with limited laboratory experience but belong to a group with high demand for application in social contexts (medical/legal/technical).

learning_goals: Learners can produce a scenario-based 3-minute instructional video explaining experimental procedures and safety protocols
Learners can submit final videos improved in clarity and practicality through a peer feedback system
Learners can collaboratively create visual representations of experimental protocols by group using LMS collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
